sources.title: Flipper Frolics (1952)
sources.description: A hound-dog and a little Scottie makes friends with a seal at the seashore. When the dogs are attacked by a mean billy-goat, it is the clumsy seal that routs the goat and gains lasting friendship with the dogs. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/flipper-frolics-1952/

metadata.Plot: A hound-dog and a little Scottie makes friends with a seal at the seashore. When the dogs are attacked by a mean billy-goat, it is the clumsy seal that routs the goat and gains lasting friendship with the dogs.
metadata.Writer: Tom Morrison, John Foster, Paul Terry
